title: Ping issues since the Project launch
body: I usually have a ping around 35 or 40ms, but I left home earlier and came back to the new Project update and my ping has been at 140ms. Anybody else having this issue?

replies.body: Everything has calmed down after a couple hours. Ping is back to 40 ms now.
same i lost 2 fucking ranked games cuz of that and i got fucking ban fucking riot is fucking me up every fucking game
